data.message:
Okay, it's been made clear that there are a lot of retards on this thread stating that this is "Illuminati" and shit, and I feel like it's up to me to lay down the cold hard facts for you bozos.

The mummy that's attached to Eminem there is Slim Shady, Em's alter ego. "Where's your proof of this fact?" I hear you ask? Well, a quick peek inside of the cover book on The Slim Shady LP shows the same mummy. Get the album yourself and take a look. That is Slim Shady. The Illuminati does not exist, it's been disbanded since the 1800s. Stop trying to connect the damn group to everything nowadays.

One more note, if the only argument you conspiracy theorists can come up with is "open your eyes" and resorting to calling the other person a 'sheep'(not even kidding, this is literally every comeback an 'Illuminatier' uses every time without fail), chances are that your 'facts' are infact bullshit.

replies.message: Your statement is poxy! You have no knowledge! So what you stated is true is it? Pffft illuminati dosnt exist haha  keep sheeping it
